alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:22AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Door County through 400 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, a cluster of strong thunderstorms was located 7 miles west of Egg Harbor, or 7 miles southeast of Marinette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Egg Harbor around 335 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Jacksonport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
